ygData.subject: Re: more sylly questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lullaby can stack it s just that any attack against the slept creature will wake it up.  With how this song has been downgraded though you really do need
ygData.messageBody:
>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] more sylly questions
>Date: Tue, 9 Nov 1999 15:58:03 -0600
>Lullaby doesnt seem to stack with anything nor does charm effetcively - at
>least it seems to wear off really fast for me.
>
Lullaby can stack it's just that any attack against the slept creature will
wake it up. With how this song has been downgraded though you really do
need to keep it going continuously to be effective.

Charm can be woven with other songs, but due to its random nature it is not
a good idea.

>Specifically, does Fulfils Curtailing NOT stack with any songs or other
>spells other players cast. In fact that would be also a good addition to
>an

In my experience Curtailing chant does stack with the Enchanter MR debuffs.
I have never received any party members saying that they could not cast a
spell on something that was under this songs influence. Can you give an
example so I can include it in the song analysis?


>analysis matrix - what spells are not compatible with various songs and
>vice
>versa. Ie: chains will break, root, snare and cancel darkness and the DoT;
>invis will kill pets; pulse songs that kill others invis; bellow will break
>a a mezzed mob, etc.

Some of this are what I would consider common game knowledge (ie invis
killing pets, Bellow breaking mesmerize since it is an attack). I did
mention the snare breaks root, but should have mentioned that it can kill
darkness line DoT's.

>
>I mean some of these things I know - but is there a definitive collection
>of
>this knowledge?
>
>John, what can i say - lots of wisps and oh yeah lots and lots of fire
>beetles!! <s>
>
>Sylly Songsynger
>Bard of the 35th Song
><Spirit of the Moon>
>somewhere on Innoruuk

Thanks for the info Sylly :)



Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
